name: Inauguration of Statue to Archduke Charles
obverse: Bust of Archduke Charles with Order of the Golden Fleece facing left.
reverse: Equestrian statue of Archduke Charles which is located on the Heldenplatz in Vienna. There are two inscriptions around the statue. The top one is the text located on the north side of the statue. The bottom one is the text located on the south side of the statue.
references: Katalog der Münzen- und Medaillen-Stempel-Sammlung des K. K. Hauptmunamtes in Wien vol. 3 p. 793
description: The statue to Archduke Charles of Austria is located in the Heldenplatz of Vienna.
